lines.text: Me and my brother's daddy was white, did you know that? Of course, we never knew him. He had another family. That's why I kind of look white. Because my daddy was white. You figured since I kind of look white, you could fuck me, what the hell... Because I was kind of black... you could dump me, what the hell.
Lila, even if I wanted to, I can't help you.
I don't have the legal authority.
You didn't have the legal authority to fuck me when I was 17 years old... but that didn't stop you, did it?
He don't know no better, he watches television. I read non-fiction.
